channel.title: Bedrock Wisdom Podcast
channel.itunes:subtitle: Seeking to understand the many ideas that unite us
channel.itunes:author: Tyler Robbins
channel.itunes:summary: Have you ever wondered what Quakers, Jains, and Sikhs have in common? Why is it that ascetic practices have been revered in nearly all parts of the world? Did you know that many 'new' discoveries in psychology are now validating ideas that the Buddha taught 2,500 years ago? In this series we explore the underlying concepts and ideas that appear to be at the core of many religious, and at times secular, traditions.
channel.description: Have you ever wondered what Quakers, Jains, and Sikhs have in common? Why is it that ascetic practices have been revered in nearly all parts of the world? Did you know that many 'new' discoveries in psychology are now validating ideas that the Buddha taught 2,500 years ago? In this series we explore the underlying concepts and ideas that appear to be at the core of many religious, and at times secular, traditions.

item.title: Episode 1 - The Role of Myth
item.itunes:title: The Role of Myth
item.itunes:author: Tyler Robbins
item.itunes:summary: What is myth and how does it play a role in human experience?
item.description: What is myth and how does it play a role in human experience?

item.title: Episode 2 - Compassion
item.itunes:title: Compassion
item.itunes:author: Tyler Robbins
item.itunes:summary: I discuss the stories of Avalokiteshvara as well as how Jesus responded to the loss of a friend.
item.description: I discuss the stories of Avalokiteshvara as well as how Jesus responded to the loss of a friend.

item.title: Episode 3 - Ritual
item.itunes:title: Ritual
item.itunes:author: Tyler Robbins
item.itunes:summary: What is ritual and how does it play a role in our everyday life?
item.description: What is ritual and how does it play a role in our everyday life?

item.title: Episode 4 - Interdependence
item.itunes:title: Interdependence
item.itunes:author: Tyler Robbins
item.itunes:summary: I discuss the idea of how everything is connected through the Daoist lense of Yin and Yang and the Buddhist concept of interdependence.
item.description: I discuss the idea of how everything is connected through the Daoist lense of Yin and Yang and the Buddhist concept of interdependence.

item.title: Episode 5 - Meditation and Prayer
item.itunes:title: Meditation and Prayer
item.itunes:author: Tyler Robbins
item.itunes:summary: I discuss the function of prayer and meditation and how they can act as a tool for keeping our mind grounded.
item.description: I discuss the function of prayer and meditation and how they can act as a tool for keeping our mind grounded.

item.title: Episode 6 - Family and Relationships
item.itunes:title: Family and Relationships
item.itunes:author: Tyler Robbins
item.itunes:summary: What is the value in having relationships with family and others? How are these emphasized in different traditions?
item.description: What is the value in having relationships with family and others? How are these emphasized in different traditions?

item.title: Episode 7 - Humility
item.itunes:title: Humility
item.itunes:author: Tyler Robbins
item.itunes:summary: Is humility a weakness or a strength? I look at this topic through the lenses of Zen, Greek philosophy, Humanism, Christianity, and Daoism.
item.description: Is humility a weakness or a strength? I look at this topic through the lenses of Zen, Greek philosophy, Humanism, Christianity, and Daoism.

item.title: Episode 8 - Asceticism
item.itunes:title: Asceticism
item.itunes:author: Tyler Robbins
item.itunes:summary: Asceticism, the practice of denying one's own personal desires in search of spiritual growth, has existed for thousands of years across a wide variety of traditions. I discuss some of those traditions.
item.description: Asceticism, the practice of denying one's own personal desires in search of spiritual growth, has existed for thousands of years across a wide variety of traditions. I discuss some of those traditions.

item.title: Episode 9 - Community
item.itunes:title: Community
item.itunes:author: Tyler Robbins
item.itunes:summary: From small hunter-gatherer groups to whole nations, communities fill a fundamental role in our physical and mental well being. In this episode I discuss the value that participation in smaller, more intimate communities provides.
item.description: From small hunter-gatherer groups to whole nations, communities fill a fundamental role in our physical and mental well being. In this episode I discuss the value that participation in smaller, more intimate communities provides.

item.title: Episode 10 - Non-Violence
item.itunes:title: Non-Violence
item.itunes:author: Tyler Robbins
item.itunes:summary: There is no question that humanity has often engaged in violence in an effort to make social changes. So how does one make a stand while refusing to engage in this ugly tendency? In this episode I highlight three groups who have tackled this challenge with success.
item.description: There is no question that humanity has often engaged in violence in an effort to make social changes. So how does one make a stand while refusing to engage in this ugly tendency? In this episode I highlight three groups who have tackled this challenge with success.

item.title: Episode 11 - The Golden Rule
item.itunes:title: The Golden Rule
item.itunes:author: Tyler Robbins
item.itunes:summary: Treat others the way you want to be treated. This concept has presented itself so often throughout history in one form or another that it's hard to keep track of. In this episode I discuss some of those sources.
item.description: Treat others the way you want to be treated. This concept has presented itself so often throughout history in one form or another that it's hard to keep track of. In this episode I discuss some of those sources.

item.title: Episode 12 - Faith
item.itunes:title: Faith
item.itunes:author: Tyler Robbins
item.itunes:summary: Faith, the act of accepting as truth an idea that cannot be scientifically verified, is inspiring... and complicated. In this episode I discuss faith and how it relates to things like works (action) and doubt.
item.description: Faith, the act of accepting as truth an idea that cannot be scientifically verified, is inspiring... and complicated. In this episode I discuss faith and how it relates to things like works (action) and doubt.

item.title: Episode 13 - Harmony With Nature
item.itunes:title: Harmony With Nature
item.itunes:author: Tyler Robbins
item.itunes:summary: The natural world holds a certain appeal. It stirs something ancient and awe-inspiring in the soul. In this episode I discuss some of the oldest spiritual traditions in the world as well as some contemporary reflections that can help us to be aware of our relationship with it.
item.description: The natural world holds a certain appeal. It stirs something ancient and awe-inspiring in the soul. In this episode I discuss some of the oldest spiritual traditions in the world as well as some contemporary reflections that can help us to be aware of our relationship with nature.

item.title: Episode 14 - Forgiveness
item.itunes:title: Forgiveness
item.itunes:author: Tyler Robbins
item.itunes:summary: Forgiveness is universally valued. But why?
item.description: Forgiveness is universally valued. But why?

item.title: Episode 15 - The Value of Struggle
item.itunes:title: The Value of Struggle
item.itunes:author: Tyler Robbins
item.itunes:summary: Life can be difficult. Despite our best efforts, we all have to experience pain and discomfort in one form or another. How we decide to engage with those challenges can make all the difference.
item.description: Life can be difficult. Despite our best efforts, we all have to experience pain and discomfort in one form or another. How we decide to engage with those challenges can make all the difference.

item.title: Episode 16 - Respect for Elders
item.itunes:title: Respect for Elders
item.itunes:author: Tyler Robbins
item.itunes:summary: The older members of our communities may not always be perfect, but they offer something valuable to society that can only be gained with time. Experience. In this episode I look at the importance of maintaining a level of respect for those who have gained it and paying attention to those who are willing to share their wisdom.
item.description: The older members of our communities may not always be perfect, but they offer something valuable to society that can only be gained with time. Experience. In this episode I look at the importance of maintaining a level of respect for those who have gained it and paying attention to those who are willing to share their wisdom.

item.title: Episode 17 - Integrity
item.itunes:title: Integrity
item.itunes:author: Tyler Robbins
item.itunes:summary: Having a high standard of morals and being truly committed to those morals aren’t always one and the same. In this episode I will look at some figures who have shown, through their actions, what it means to be a person of integrity.
item.description: Having a high standard of morals and being truly committed to those morals aren’t always one and the same. In this episode I will look at some figures who have shown, through their actions, what it means to be a person of integrity.

item.title: Episode 18 - Mind, Body, Spirit
item.itunes:title: Mind, Body, Spirit
item.itunes:author: Tyler Robbins
item.itunes:summary: "The body is a temple." Most traditions recognize the inseparable bond between body and mind. I discuss how some have harnessed this connection in search of higher understanding.
item.description: "The body is a temple." Most traditions recognize the inseparable bond between body and mind. I discuss how some have harnessed this connection in search of higher understanding.

item.title: Episode 19 - Winter Traditions, Light and Charity
item.itunes:title: Winter Traditions, Light and Charity
item.itunes:author: Tyler Robbins
item.itunes:summary: The dark days of winter can help us understand the value of light.
item.description: The dark days of winter can help us understand the value of light.

item.title: Episode 20 - Creativity in Visual Art
item.itunes:title: Creativity in Visual Art
item.itunes:author: Tyler Robbins
item.itunes:summary: Art has been used for centuries as a means to express our relationship to the divine. In this episode we highlight some ways in which this has been expressed visually.
item.description: Art has been used for centuries as a means to express our relationship to the divine. In this episode I highlight some ways in which this has been expressed visually.

item.title: Episode 21 - Coming of Age
item.itunes:title: Coming of Age
item.itunes:author: Tyler Robbins
item.itunes:summary: That phase of life between childhood and adulthood can be challenging. Special rites can help ease the transition for both the young person and their tribe.
item.description: That phase of life between childhood and adulthood can be challenging. Special rites can help ease the transition for both the young person and their tribe.
